Incident.IncidentName: [Smoke Testing][Prelim Supplier] - Error received after executing job EAI - Process DB Process Instances
[Supplier Enablement][Smoke Testing][Prelim Supplier] - Error received after executing job EAI - Process DB Process Instances - Copy
ERP_APPROVED type is not showing after running schedule - Message not triggered to EAI when running EAI Schedule
Mandatory fields on mapping document are blank on SUPPLIER_ACTIVATED
WorkflowStatus Tag is not in payload but shows as mandatory field on Mapping document
New insert process instance created on EAI after supplier inserted successfully
CLOB error thrown in logs when POSTing a new supplier
Supplier [Status] fields in EAI are not updated as supplier is processed in the various consuming systems
Multiple fields in SupplierHistory table are empty or null but require their values to be updated as the supplier is processed
FinERP xsl not extracting tax code and vat country code
Updates to the ON HOLD STATUS in D365 does not change the isActive and AllowOrderCreation field in RW dbo.Supplier
New update process instance created on EAI after supplier update is triggered
[PrelimSupplier] - OriginCountry is sent as full qualifying country description but we require ISO Codes
Valid Date not being set to the date when the supplier is onboarded
SrcSystem field in ProcessInstanceHistory is not being updated
Multiple fields in Supplier table are empty or null but require their values to be updated as the supplier is processed
No validation on ProfileStatus field in PrelimSupplier payload
Updates are not based on priority - Financial vs non financial
SupplierChainCode validation only checks for an empty string but requires a value in RW
MesssageID field in EAI tables is not being used or updated
SupplierStatus payload is posting SupplierFinancialChainCode instead of SupplierFinancialCode
[D365 Integration] - XSL has incorrect namespace therefore not transforming the payload into a form acceptable by D365
[D365 - EAI Integration] - D365 Outbound XSL transforms the fields to an incorrect structure therefore not interpratable by EAI
[D365 - EAI] - EnterpriseTypes XSD missing on WSO2
[D365 - EAI] - FinancialSupplierOutFinERP XSD not deployed to WSO2 UAT
[D365 - EAI] - ProcessInstance moved to ERP Ready status without running the job
DAXFinancialPrelimSupplierInSeq InFinErp XSD missing in sequence
ERP_APPROVED type is not showing after running schedule - Message not triggered to EAI when running EAI Schedule - Copy
Mandatory fields on mapping document are blank on SUPPLIER_ACTIVATED - Copy
WorkflowStatus Tag is not in payload but shows as mandatory field on Mapping document - Copy
[EAI - RW] - Validation in SourceFactoryStatus does not match validation for ProfileStatus and general agreement on SourceFactoryStatus values
Supplier History and Supplier tables - Insert status is set to Approved, updated also set to approved
Supplier and SupplierHistory - FINERP and FINERPStatus are not being set to pending when update triggered from Adjuno
ERPStatus is set for Updates only not inserts
Updates on the ProcessCode Column set to Suppler SUPP_ADJ_UPDATE_ALL because Field Scope table is set to Update Profile Status on all consuming systems.
No fields besides ProfileStatus are being updated when an update is received from Adjuno
Inconsistency - Approved wording
Update is not successful for fields that are initially captured as an empty string
BankAccountNo is named BankAccountNumber in FieldScope table which causes update to fail
ProfileStatus FieldType is set to DATA instead of KEY which causes update to be broadcasted to all consuming systems
BankAccountNumber is set to FinERPStatus = NO in FieldScope table which does not change the ON HOLD STATUS for the supplier if parsed in an update
SupplierFinancialCode and FiNERPCode on the Supplier and SupplierHistory tables in EAI store the same values
